page.title: 08HEADCORN'S SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content: There are many sporting facilities available to both young and old who live in the area. There is a{football {club}which runs both youth and adult teams and which has its own pitch and changing rooms. The{cricket club}also functions for young and old with its own pavillion and social club. This is shared with the{tennis club}which has both hard courts and grass and floodlights. A{table tennis club}and a {badminton club}operate for the teenage group. Other more{unusual sports}are catered for at sports centres in Maidstone and Ashford. During summer school holidays the Primary School {swimming pool}is used by the pupils. There are also{two village greens. Both have general play equipment like swings and slides and roundabouts. A {footpath society}operates for those who prefer rambling to running.
